SA20n1389:899: apareṇa vā punaḥ samayena tāṃ vikṛtiṃ na paśyati |
SA20n1389:910: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyudāvarttya punaḥ śītakāle pūrvvoktairevākāraiḥ paśyati |
SA20n1389:913: me saṃskārā iti pūrvvavadeva [ṃ] śītakṛtāṃ vipariṇāmānityatāṃ paryeṣate |
SA20n1389:917: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti pūrvvavat |
SA20n1389:921: sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpannāṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ |
SA20n1389:925: tasya pūrvvāṃ paryeṣaṇā āsāṃ vedanānāṃ navanavatāniḥpurāṇa purāṇatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupāsthāyitamanyathībhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
SA20n1389:931: samohaṃ vigatamohamanyatamānyatamena vā upakleśenopakliṣṭaṃ cittamupakliṣṭamiti parijānāti |
SA20n1389:934: rvvāparyeṇaibhiḥ kleśopakleśairavatīparṇavipariṇatā[']vipariṇatāṃcittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bateme saṃskārā iti |
SA20n1389:968: vijñānaśūnyaṃ kalevaraṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavatīti vistareṇa pūrvvavat ||
SA20n1389:973: ekadā vipūyakāvasthamenaṃ vistareṇa yāvasthiśaṃkalikāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvāsyaivaṃ bhavatyanityā bata(te)
SA20n1389:983: me saṃskārāstathā hyeṣāṃ paurvvāparyeṇa pratyakṣata evāyamevaṃ rūpo vikāra upalabhyate |
SA20n1389:985: evaṃ tāvatpratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇādhyātmikasya vastunaḥ [paṃca] daśabhirākārairvipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavacārayati |
SA20n1389:988: ye'nena pṛthivīpradeśā nābhisaṃskṛtāḥ pūrvvaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavanti |
SA20n1389:993: titapatitān khalu chidrānagninā vā dagdhānudakena vāpahratāṃ(hṛtān) |
SA20n1389:998: ṣāṃ paurvvāparyeṇāyamevaṃrūpaḥ pratyakṣo vikāro vipariṇāma upalabhyate |
SA20n1389:1000: evaṃ tṛṇauṣadhivanaspataya ārāmodyānāni ca samṛddhapatrapuṣpaphalāni paśyati |
SA20n1389:1006: tathā parvatānyekadā samṛddhapāṣāṇāni paśyatyekadā nirluṭhitapāṣāṇāni patita śrṛṃgāṇi,
SA20n1389:1013: sarveṇa vā sarvvaṃ viśuṣkāṇi khilībhūtāni koṭarāṇi |
SA20n1389:1017: tathā kośasannidhīnāṃ vicitrāṇāṃ nānāprakārāṇāmekadā ācayaṃ paśyatyekadā apacayaṃ |
SA20n1389:1020: tathā vividhāni yānānyekadā sumaṇḍitāni svalaṃkṛtānyabhinavāni paśyatyekadā vigatālaṃkārāṇi |
SA20n1389:1039: ebhiraṣṭābhirvipariṇāmakāraṇaiḥ pūrvvanirdiṣṭairasyādhyātmikabāhyasya vastuno yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇaivaṃ vipariṇāmākāreṇānityatāṃ vyavacārayati |
SA20n1389:1040: yathānena sā vipariṇāmānityatā pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭā bhavatyanubhūtā,
SA20n1389:1045: sa evaṃ pratyakṣādhipateyena manaskāreṇa vipariṇāmānityatāṃ vyavahā(cā)
SA20n1389:1047: yeṣāṃ rūpiṇāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ satī samvidyamānā kṣaṇotpannabhagnā vinīlatā(vilīnatā)
SA20n1389:1049: tatra pratyakṣādhipateyaṃ manaskāraṃ niśrityānumānaṃ karotyevañca punaranumānaṃ karoti |
SA20n1389:1052: iti hi kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārāsteṣu teṣu pratyayeṣu satsu tathā tathotpadyante |
SA20n1389:1058: sahaiva tena vināśakāraṇena vinaṣṭānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ yasmādvisadṛśā (śī)
SA20n1389:1062: tadyathā kvāthyamānāmasāmante sarvveṇa sarvvamparikṣayo bhavatiagninirdagdhānāṃ ca lokabhājanānāṃ masirapi na[pra]jñāyate |
SA20n1389:1064: śiṣṭamapi na prajñāyate teṣāmapyuttarottarakaraṇaparyādānādante sarvveṇa sarvvamabhāvo bhavati |
SA20n1389:1066: tasmādvipariṇāmakāraṇānyetānyaṣṭau yathoktāni svarasenaiva tu vināśo bhavati |
SA20n1389:1067: sa evamānumānikamanaskāreṇa saṃskāreṇākṣaṇotpannabhagnavilīnatāyāṃ niścayaṃ pratilabhya punarapyapratyakṣaparalokāsaṃskārapravṛttāvanumānaṃ karoti ||
SA20n1389:1088: sa cedīśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ syāttadīśvarapratyayameva vā syādanyena vopādāneneśvaro nirmimīta |
SA20n1389:1089: sa cedīśvara pratyayameva syāt teneśvarasyaiṣāñca saṃskārāṇāṃ yaugapadyaṃ syāt |
SA20n1389:1096: yadi sahetukā īśvarahetukaiva ca tena pūrvvakeṇa doṣeṇa tulyatayā na yujyate |
SA20n1389:1099: praṇidhānamīśvaravinirmuktānyadharmahetukā tathā sarvve[']pi saṃskārā dharmahetukā eva bhaviṣyanti |
SA20n1389:1104: tatra yā pūrvva pañca [vidhā'] nityatā pañcākārabhāvanānugatā uddiṣṭā,
SA20n1389:1113: sopareṇa samayena svāmibhāvamadāsabhāvaṃ vihāya pareṣāṃ dāsabhāvamupagacchati |
SA20n1389:1120: tatra dharmatākārā ['] nityatā yathāpi tasyā eva vipariṇāmānityatāyāḥ vināśānityatāyāḥ |
SA20n1389:1122: [']dhvani bhāvinyā dharmatāṃ pratividhyatyevaṃ dharmāṇa ete saṃskārā anāgate[']dhvani evaṃbhāgīyā iti |
SA20n1389:1127: sa evamādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ pañcavidhāyāmanityatāyāmebhiḥ pañcabhirākārairyathāyogaṃ manasikārabāhulyādupapattisādhanabhāvanādhipatyācca niye(rme)
SA20n1389:1132: iti hyeta eva saṃskārā jātidharmāṇaḥ jātiśca duḥkhā, yadā(yā)
SA20n1389:1147: tathā hyaduḥkhāsukhāsthānīyāḥ skandhāḥ sopādānā dauṣṭhulyasahagatā abījānugatā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatayā,
SA20n1389:1152: yaduta saṃyojanabandhanākāreṇa duḥkhavedanāsthānīyeṣu saṃskāreṣuduḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāmavatīrṇṇo bhavati |
SA20n1389:1157: saṃyojanabandhanākāramaniṣṭākāraṃ yogakṣemākāraṃ cādhipatiṃ kṛtvā tisṛṣu vedanāsu yatkiñcidvedayitamidamatra duḥkhasyetyevamayamanityākārapūrvvakeṇa manaskāreṇa duḥkhākāramavatīrṇṇo bhavati |
SA20n1389:1197: yasya prahāṇādasya duḥkhasya prahāṇaṃ syādityebhiścaturbhirākāraissamudayasatyasya lakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |
SA20n1389:1204: upādānahetukasya ca bhavasya samudāgamādbhavapūrvikāyā jāteḥ prabhavatvāt,
SA20n1389:1213: yaḥ kleśānuśaya āśraya[ḥ] punarbhavāmabhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ veditavyaṃ [ | ]
SA20n1389:1216: sa āyatyāṃ punarbhavābhinirvṛttaye hetustajjasya ca paryavasthānasya yathāyogaṃ samudayaḥ,
SA20n1389:1220: sāpuna[ḥ]paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā nandīrāgasahagatāyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ prabhavo bhavati sā punarnandīrāgasahagatā tṛṣṇā prabhūtā,
SA20n1389:1221: tatra tatrābhinandinyāstṛṣṇāyāḥ pratyayo bhavatyevamasyānuśayagatāṃ trividhaparyavasthāgatāṃ ca tṛṣṇāmāgamyāyati[ḥ] |
SA20n1389:1228: samudayasatyalakṣaṇaṃ pratisaṃvedya asya samudayasatyasyāśeṣoparamannirodhaṃ nirodhata ākārayati |
SA20n1389:1244: sa evaṃ pratyātmikān skandhān pratyayenopaparīkṣya vyavacārayitvā (vyavacārya)
SA20n1389:1248: yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvatra sarvaśaḥ [evaṃ tadevaṃ pratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ |
SA20n1389:1251: te[']pyevaṃ dharmāṇaste[']pyevaṃ nayapatitā iti yatkiñcitsaṃskṛtaṃ sarvvatra sarvaśa] evaṃ tadevaṃprakṛtikaṃ,
SA20n1389:1254: nairyāṇiko yastatprahāṇāya tasya yadā vipakṣokteṣu pratyātmikeṣu skandheṣu satyajñānaṃ |
SA20n1389:1257: sa cāyaṃ lakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī manaskāraḥ śrutacintāvyavakīrṇṇo veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1389:1258: yadā teṣu satyeṣvayaṃ yogī evaṃ samyak(g)
SA20n1389:1262: tadā śrutacintāmayaṃ manaskāraṃ samatikramya vyavatīrṇṇavarttinamekāntena bhāvanākāreṇādhimucyate |
SA20n1389:1265: sa tasyānvayā[d]dve satye adhikṛtya duḥkhasatyañca samudayasatyañca aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabhate |
SA20n1389:1316: ānimittamānimittataḥ paśyāmi mamaite dharmāstaddhetostatpratyayasya taccittaṃ na praskandatyā(tya)
SA20n1389:1320: raṃ vibandhakāra iti laghu laghveva prajñayā pratividhya,
SA20n1389:1327: sa utpannotpannaṃ cittaṃ nirudhyamānamanantarotpannena cittena bhajyamānaṃ paśyati |
SA20n1389:1333: tathā prayukto[']yaṃ yogī yattasyāścittasantateḥ anyo[']nyatāṃ navanavatāmāpāyikatāṃ tāvatkālikatāmitvarapratyupasthāyitāñca paurvvāparyeṇa paśyatīdamasyā[a]nityatāyā yattasyāścittasantateḥ upādānaskandhānupraviṣṭatāṃ paśyatīdamasya duḥkhatāyāstatra yaccittaṃ dharmaṃ nopalabhate |
SA20n1389:1341: asyā api cittasanteteryo nirodhaḥ so[']pi śāntaḥ |
SA20n1389:1343: sa nairyāṇika ityevamaparīkṣitamanaskāraparīkṣāyogena sūkṣmayā prajñayā na tānyāryasatyānyavatīrṇṇo bhavati |
SA20n1389:1358: tasya taccittaṃ tasmin samaye niruddhamiva khyāti |
SA20n1389:1371: tasya tatsarvvapaścimanirvvikalpaṃcittaṃ yasyānantaraṃ pūrvavicāriteṣu satveṣvadhyātmamābhogaṃ karoti |
SA20n1389:1381: tasyotpādāt traidhātukāvacarāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ kleśānāṃ pakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyasanniśrayasanniviṣṭaṃ tatprahīyate |
SA20n1389:1382: tasya prahāṇāt sacetpūrvvameva kāmebhyo vītarāgo bhavati |
SA20n1389:1393: sa bhūyassa tasya dauṣṭhulyasya pratipraśrabdheḥ srota āpanno bhavati |
SA20n1389:1400: tasyemāni liṃgāni catvāri jñānānyanena pratilabdhāni bhavanti |
SA20n1389:1430: tasya yāvallaukikebhyo[']gradharmebhya adhimokṣiko manaskāraḥ satyānyabhisamitavataḥ darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu prāvivekyo manaskāraḥ,
SA20n1389:1432: ata ūrdhvaṃ yathāpratilabdhaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayato[']bhyasyataḥ kāmāvacarāṇāmadhimātramadhyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇāt sakṛdāgāmī bhavati |
SA20n1389:1435: ayañca viśeṣo yadviṣaye[']dharakleśasthānīyeṣu adhimātraparyavasthānīye[']pi baddhaṃ kleśaparyavasthānamutpādayatyāśu cāpanayati |
SA20n1389:1438: anāgāmiliṃgāni ca pūrvvoktānītyeva tatra sarvvo bhāvanāmārgaḥ pratyavekṣya pratyavekṣya mīmānsā(māṃsa)
SA20n1389:1443: yaḥ samāhitabhūmikena manaskāreṇa laukikalokottareṇaiṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhyāsaḥ |
SA20n1389:1451: tatra ye tāvadapratilabdhā dharmāḥ kuśalā vaiśeṣikāstān pratilabhate |
SA20n1389:1479: tathā tathā adhobhūmikāḥ prahāṇādharmā dūrī bhavanti |
SA20n1389:1491: tatra laukikamārgabhāvanā [ya] dadhobhūmikānāmaudārikadarśanatayā uparibhūmīnāṃ ca śāntadarśanatayā,
SA20n1389:1493: tatra lokottaramārgabhāvanā duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvvataḥ,
SA20n1389:1497: tatra madhyamārgabhāvanā yayā madhyān kleśān prajahāti |
SA20n1389:1498: tatrādhi[mātra] mārgabhāvanā yayā mṛduṃ kleśaprakāraṃ prajahāti |
SA20n1389:1500: tatra prayogamārgabhāvanā yayā prayogamārabhate kleśa prahāṇāya |
SA20n1389:1502: tatra vimuktimārgabhāvanā yayā samanantaraprahīṇe kleśavimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti |
SA20n1389:1507: tasyaivaṃ bhāvanāprayuktasya kālena ca kālaṃ kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmānsa(māṃsa)
SA20n1389:1509: kālena kālaṃ saṃvejanīyeṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ samvejayataḥ,
SA20n1389:1511: tasyāsya ratisaṃgrāhakasya manaskārasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayādbahulīkārānvayānniravaśeṣabhāvanāprahātavyā [ḥ] kleśaprahāṇāya sarvvapaścimaḥ śaikṣo vajropamaḥ samādhirutpadyate |
SA20n1389:1521: tasya vajropamasya samādheḥ samanantaraṃ sarvvakleśapakṣyaṃ dauṣṭhulyabījasamuddhātādatyantatāyai cittamadhimucyate |
SA20n1389:1530: aśaikṣayā samyagdṛṣṭyā samyaksaṃkalpena yāvadaśaikṣayā samyagvimuktyā samyagjñānena [ | ]
SA20n1389:1538: yaṃ yamevākāṃkṣate dharmaṃ manasi karttuṃ kuśalamarthopasaṃhitaṃ |
SA20n1389:1552: kta cittaḥ, suvimuktaprajñaḥ kevalo ukṣi..........cca...........li puruṣa ityucyate |
SA20n1389:1555: bhavati suṣṭhumanāḥ upekṣako bhavati smṛtaḥ samprajā[nā]naḥ |
SA20n1389:1566: samacittaśca bhavati vāsī candanakalpaḥ sendro pitryāṇāṃ devānāṃ mānyaśca pūjyaśca mārgakāśeṣadhātupratiṣṭhite ca bhavati tīrṇṇaḥ pāragato[']ntimādehadhārītyucyate |
SA20n1389:1567: pūrvakarmakleśāviddhānāṃ pañca skandhānāṃ svarasaṃ..........nānu pādānāt vā,
SA20n1389:1571: nānyatra yad duḥkhaṃ tanniruddhaṃ tavyupaśāntaṃ tacchītībhūtaṃ bhava iṃ gataṃ |
SA20n1389:1573: yaduta sarvvopadhipratiniḥsarvasaṃjñākṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇaṃ tasyemāni liṃgānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni veditavyāni |
SA20n1389:1577: prāpayituṃ mandadā tra ma brahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratiṣevituṃ |
SA20n1389:1580: tathā bhavyaḥ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyetuṃ |
SA20n1389:1583: 'anyatāmānyatamvā bhayabhairavaṃ........saṃtrāsamāpattu rayamasau vajropamaḥ samādhirayaṃ prayoganiṣṭho manaskāraḥ yaḥ punaragraphalārhattvasaṃgṛhītamanaskāro'yaṃ prayoganiṣṭhāphalo manaskāraḥ |
SA20n1389:1584: ebhiḥ saptabhirmanaskārairlokottareṇa mārgeṇātyantaniṣṭhāt ā/prā pā taḥ-ta
SA20n1389:1585: ityayamucyate sā/mo dha ka sarvveṣāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃyuktānāṃ nirdeśasthānīyānāṃ sākṣātkā[ra] sthānīyānāṃ tadyathā sarvanāmakāyapadakāyavyaṃjanakāyakāvyamanu śāstrāṇi || mātṛkā ||
